meanings.definition: A person who writes their initials on something.
meanings.sent1: The initialers signed their names on the document.
meanings.sent2: I found the initialers on the bottom of the painting.
meanings.sent3: The initialers left their mark on the tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: The initialers were like tiny flags waving on the paper.
meanings.sent5: The initialers were like secret codes waiting to be deciphered.

meanings.definition: The act of writing one's initials on something.
meanings.sent1: The initialers were done quickly and neatly.
meanings.sent2: She always does the initialers with a flourish.
meanings.sent3: The initialers looked like little birds hopping across the page.
meanings.sent4: His initialers were like breadcrumbs leading to his work.
meanings.sent5: The initialers were like small tattoos marking ownership.
